Class Loan

java.lang.Object
bahaa.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
Holds data for a loan request, including the user's income and application status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Loan(int userId, double amount, String reason, double annualIncome)
    Creates a new loan application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(int userId, double amount, String reason, double annualIncome)
      Creates a new loan application. The status starts as "Pending" by default.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user applying
      amount - the loan amount requested
      reason - the purpose of the loan
      annualIncome - the user's yearly income

      Returns:

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Updates the status of the loan (e.g., to Accepted or Rejected).
      Parameters:
      status - the new status string

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Formats the loan data into a single string for saving to a file.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      comma-separated loan details
